original_text: Instead of them, he will honor a god of fortresses; a god unknown to his ancestors he will honor with gold and silver, with precious stones and costly gifts.
korean_text: 그 대신에 강한 신을 공경할 것이요 또 그의 조상들이 알지 못하던 신에게 금 은 보석과 보물을 드려 공경할 것이며

sentences.original_text: Instead of them, he will honor a god of fortresses
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 대신에, 그는 요새의 신을 공경할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: a god unknown to his ancestors
he will honor with gold and silver
with precious stones and costly gifts
